EmailTemplate.name: Fundraiser-Donations
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
This email is confirmation that we have received and will consider your request. Currently, our Fundraiser/Donation Program is suspended, and we are unable to offer funds, discounted or donated product. We hope to have this program back up and running at some point in mid-2017.
We appreciate your inquiry and thinking of YETI.
Sincerely,
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com
